Method Detail

getFloatingLicenseTypes

IContributorLicenseType[] getFloatingLicenseTypes()
                                                  throws TeamRepositoryException
Returns list of floating client access licenses types that can be shared with other servers

Returns:
a list of know client access license types
Throws:
TeamRepositoryException

addLicenses2

com.ibm.team.repository.common.model.ILicensesInfo2 addLicenses2(java.lang.String[] localFiles,
                                                                 boolean submit,
                                                                 java.lang.String[] operationIdsToCheck)
                                                                 throws TeamRepositoryException
Adds the set of licenses to the server and returns the state of the server after the add. If submit is false then the licenses are not really added and the return value is the calculated value of what the server state would look like if submit had been true

Parameters:
localFiles - the licenses to be added
submit - whether to apply the licenses or not
Throws:
TeamRepositoryException - if anything goes wrong

getTotalUserCount

int getTotalUserCount(java.lang.String licenseId)
                      throws TeamRepositoryException
Returns the number of licenses available for the given license id. This total is the sum of the number of included licenses and the number of purchased licenses.

Parameters:
licenseId - the id of the license
Returns:
the total number of licenses
Throws:
TeamRepositoryException

terminateLeases

void terminateLeases(IContributorHandle handle)
                     throws TeamRepositoryException
Terminates the floating license leases associated with the specified user. If the specified user is null, then the currently authenticated user is used. Only a user with the JazzAdmins J2EE role is allowed to terminate the leases for other users.

Parameters:
handle - the user to release license leases of, or null to use the authenticated user.
Throws:
TeamRepositoryException - if something goes wrong.
Since:
3.0

testLicenseAssignments

void testLicenseAssignments(java.lang.String[] licenseIds)
                            throws TeamRepositoryException
Tests whether a user is allowed to have the given licenses assigned at the same time. If the assignments are allowed then this method will complete without error. If the licenses cannot be assigned together, then an TeamRepositoryException will be thrown to explain the problem.

Parameters:
param - the licenses to assign together
Throws:
TeamRepositoryException - if the licenses are not valid to be assigned together.
Since:
3.0
